Sentencas: The steam reforming of methane was studied over a Ni-based electrode-catalyst in a solid oxide fuel cell under open- and closed-circuit conditions.
Titulo: Internal steam reforming of methane over Ni-based electrode in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Experiments were performed over a temperature range of 800-850 degrees C and steam/methane ratios of 2-4.
Titulo: Internal steam reforming of methane over Ni-based electrode in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The reaction rate was found to be first order with respect to methane concentration.
Titulo: Internal steam reforming of methane over Ni-based electrode in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The apparent activation energy was 39 kcal/mol.
Titulo: Internal steam reforming of methane over Ni-based electrode in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It was shown that anodic and cathodic polarization of the electrode-catalyst caused nearly no change in its catalytic properties for steam reforming of methane.
Titulo: Internal steam reforming of methane over Ni-based electrode in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A method of estimation of the electrode catalytic activity for methane steam reforming based on the open-circuit electrode potential value is proposed.
Titulo: Internal steam reforming of methane over Ni-based electrode in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The loading of the Ni-based electrode-catalyst in the solid oxide fuel cell with internal steam reforming of methane is estimated.
Titulo: Internal steam reforming of methane over Ni-based electrode in solid oxide fuel cells
